answers.answer: I also got gd very early and they were thinking i may have been borderline before preg (which i kind of was as i was pre-diabetic for about 3 years before) anyhoo. my baby is perfectly fine even though we didn't start "controlling" the gd until 14 weeks.Good Luck,J

question: I'm pregnant with twins.  My hemoglobin a1c at 10 weeks was 5.7, which I think was very good (under 7).  However, 2 weeks later, I went for GT test and failed big time.  Dr. said I may have been diabetec before getting pregnant.  I don't think so.  I had gestational diabetes on my previous pregnancy.  I'm worried that my baby have have abnormalities because of this.
title: gestational diabetes
